title: How to Stop Anxiety w/ Psychiatrist & Neuroscientist Jud Brewer | The Expert Series
itunes:title: How to Stop Anxiety w/ Psychiatrist & Neuroscientist Jud Brewer | The Expert Series
description:
On this week's episode of the Expert Series, American psychiatrist, neuroscientist, and New York Times best-selling author Jud Brewer steps in with Rob Dial to discuss the intricate workings of the brain and how to stop your anxiety!

--
